patthana17.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana17.1:10.1_0: It’s not for the sake of investigating, nor for three reasons.
patthana17.1:10.1_2: He doesn’t possess the three factors of stream-entry, nor to the noble ones. ...
patthana17.1:13.1_0: (All should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana17.1:15.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power have been sent back to the beginning for seven years.
patthana17.1:15.1_1: Soon afterwards they were born in each other with ninety supports, and the eighteen bases of psychic power appears to the next. ...
patthana17.1:15.1_2: They brought the new path to nine streams ...
patthana17.1:15.1_4: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)

patthana17.1:16.1_0: He is not committed to painful feeling ...
patthana17.1:17.1_0: For the sake of fame, the heavenly basis for five reasons ...
patthana17.1:18.0.1_0: propose this, he came to the uneven ground.
patthana17.1:19.1_1: there are no five kinds of people born from teachers ...
patthana17.1:19.1_2: No to perform the five destinations, but not in hand.
patthana17.1:19.1_3: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
patthana17.1:19.1_4: (The following should be expanded as in SN 35.18.)
patthana17.1:21.1_0: (These three discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana17.1:4.1_0: There is no declared by pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.1:4.1_1: There is no answer for pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.1:4.1_2: There is no declared by laying to be experienced in pleasant feeling. And they don’t arise because of pleasant feeling.
patthana17.1:6.0_0: nor for the sake of going forth.
patthana17.1:6.1_0: There is no such thing as pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.1:9.1_0: There is no declared by laying to be experienced as pleasant feeling.
patthana17.1:9.1_1: No to give rise to pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.1:9.1_2: No to perform the three feelings ...
